AssessmentSignature.name: AssessmentSignature
AssessmentSignature.description: Stores the respondent’s signature during an assessment.

AssessmentId.description: The assessment that's associated with the signature.

DateTime.description: The date and time of signature.

DigitalSignatureId.description: The digital signature that's associated with the assessment signature record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of this assessment signature record.

OmniscriptIdentifier.description: Identifier of signature instance in OmniScript Form.

Place.description: The location at the time of signature.

SignedBy.description: The name of the individual who signed the assessment.

SignedInitial.description: The initial used when signing the assessment.

SigneeId.description: The user or contact who signed the assessment.
